name: biigle/user-disks
description: BIIGLE module to offer private storage disks for users.

suggest.biigle/laravel-elements-storage: Required if the 'elements' disk type should be enabled
suggest.biigle/laravel-webdav: Required if the 'webdav' and/or 'dcache' disk type should be enabled
suggest.biigle/laravel-socialite-haai: Required if the 'dcache' disk type should be enabled
